plot: The town drunk in the old-west faces his past when Fate lends a hand.

As a young man, Al Denton was pretty handy with a gun, something that was always useful in the old west. Now, he's the town drunk. He's regularly bullied and humiliated by the town's gunslinger Dan Hotaling but when he out-guns him, he's suddenly the town hero. As he predicted however a gunslinger, Pete Grant, is coming to town to challenge him. Al decides that it's best to just run away. Hovering about throughout it all is Henry J. Fate, who describes himself as a dealer in everything. He sells Al a potion that will make him the fastest gunman in the west. Now all Al can do is wait for Grant to arrive.—garykmcd
